meanings.definition: relating to the level of glucose in the blood
meanings.sent1: The glycemic test showed his blood sugar level was stable.
meanings.sent2: She monitored her glycemic levels to manage her diabetes.
meanings.sent3: The glycemic chart made his doctor chuckle during the check-up.
meanings.sent4: Her glycemic control was a rollercoaster ride of highs and lows.
meanings.sent5: The glycemic index was a crucial factor in his diet plan.

meanings.definition: a measure of how quickly a food raises blood sugar levels
meanings.sent1: The glycemic of that snack was surprisingly high.
meanings.sent2: He checked the glycemic of various foods before choosing his meal.
meanings.sent3: The glycemic of the cake made it the star of the party.
meanings.sent4: Her choice of snacks had a glycemic that shot through the roof.
meanings.sent5: Understanding the glycemic of foods helped him make healthier choices.
